INTERSTATE yHIGHWAYS

Tue MarYLAND StaTE PoLice are highly trained to perform the functions

Maryland. They are constantly on patrol in the interest of the motorist.
Over 1,300 troopers are stationed at the following 25 key locations

A TRIP THROUGH MARYLAND
. . . A TRIP THROUGH HISTORY



INTERSTATE yHIGHWAYS

Tue MarYLAND StaTE PoLice are highly trained to perform the functions
that assure the safe and lawful use of the highways of the State of
Maryland. They are constantly on patrol in the interest of the motorist.
Over 1,300 troopers are stationed at the following 25 key locations
throughout the State; when you need assistance or information call or

History is around every bend in Maryland.
